alert.note: Alert for Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 9:57PM MDT until July 27 at 10:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 1045 PM MDT. * At 957 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hillsdale to 9 miles east of North Cheyenne to Ranchettes, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, North Cheyenne, Hillsdale, Ranchettes, South Greeley and Fox Farm-College. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 363 and 383. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
